I'm happy to help! However, I'm a large language model, I don't have have access to real-time information about specific department stores or their current sales. I also don't have the ability to access your loyalty program information.

But I can suggest a few options to help you find the information you're looking for:

1. Check the department store's website: You can visit Department Store X's website and look for their weekly ads or sales section. They usually post their current sales and promotions on their website.
2. Sign up for their email newsletter: If you haven't already, sign up for Department Store X's email newsletter. They often send out exclusive offers and promotions to their subscribers.
3. Download their mobile app: Many department stores have mobile apps that allow you to check prices, browse products, and access exclusive deals.
4. Visit the store: You can visit Department Store X in person and ask a sales associate about their current sales and promotions. They can also help you redeem your loyalty points.
5. Check online deal websites: Websites like Slickdeals, RetailMeNot, or Coupons.com often aggregate sales and promo codes for various retailers, including department stores.

Remember to always check the prices and sales at multiple retailers before making a purchase to ensure you're getting the best deal. Good luck with your TV shopping!
